item.description:
In August, we will NOT be having our regular Tuesday meetup at Dave's loft.

Instead, once again, thanks to Heather Laier, BostonLOA member, we have exclusive access to the lovely beach, pond and trails at Camp Nihan for us to enjoy.

Come PLAY with us... bring your family & friends for a picnic, swim, hike and of cos, fun LOA activities too. There's canoes, kayaks & paddleboats to enjoy.

Who Should Come: members, kids and guests
Time: 1 - 6 pm (come when you can)

Cost: $5/ adult
Kids: free

See photos & feedback from last year:
http://www.meetup.com...
*******************************************************
For everybody’s enjoyment, please bring:
- a potluck entrée to share
and a willingness to be silly and just have fun ;o)

Optional:
- blankets
- umbrella
- lawn chairs
- bug spray
- sun screen


We’ll provide:
- napkins, plates & cups
- refreshments
- desserts
- lifeguard

We’ll be inviting members from other LOA-related meetups to join us…the more, the merrier!

*****************************************

About Camp Nihan:
Camp Nihan is an ideal facility for camping, swimming, hiking and nature exploration embracing sixty five acres of woodland forest, marsh and a spring fed pond. The Saugus River flows through the camp property providing ideal habitats for animals such as heron and mallards. A variety of mammals reside in and around the area, including fox, deer and river otter.

Directions
From Rte. 1, Saugus take Route 129 West, Walnut Street towards Wakefield. The entrance to the Camp will be on your left 2/10ths of a mile after the first traffic light. Look for a small green sign. Continue on the gravel road and park in the first parking lot or as instructed by DCR staff. Please drive slowly as children may be in the road.

From Rte. 128 take the Route 1 South, Boston exit and then follow the directions for Route 1 above.

group.name: The Boston Law of Attraction Meetup Group

item.name: Beach Picnic at this beautiful camp - come PLAY with family & friends
